Html Helper here...

The purpose of HTML helpers here is to augment Code Igniter platform HTML helpers and to provide a cheap replacement when you want to disable Smarty (or any other template engine) support in BareboneMVC platform.

=== `html_options_assoc()` ===

`html_options_assoc()` is a function that creates `<select><option>` group as HTML format string. 

{{{
string html_options_assoc(dictionary params)
}}}

|| *Key Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *`name`* || `string` || *Yes* || None || ... ||
|| *`values`* || `dictionary`  || No ||  || ... ||
|| *`selected`* || ... || ... || ... || ... ||
